data.trans: Tìm đến ai để được giúp đỡ
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy không có ai giúp đỡ khi cô ấy gặp rắc rối.
data.en_hint: She had nobody to turn to when she met troubles.
data.content_game_1: She had nobody to turn to when she met troubles.
data.answer_en_hint: She had nobody to turn to when she met troubles.

data.trans_hint: Tôi sẽ tìm cách trả đũa họ!
data.en_hint: I'll find a way of getting back at them!
data.content_game_1: I'll find a way of Getting back at them!
data.answer_en_hint: I'll find a way of Getting back at them!

data.trans_hint: Những người qua đường vô tội bị cuốn vào cuộc bạo loạn.
data.en_hint: Innocent passers-by got caught up in the riots.
data.content_game_1: Innocent passers-by Got caught up in the riots.
data.answer_en_hint: Innocent passers-by Got caught up in the riots.

data.trans: Thể hiện cảm xúc qua hành động gì
data.trans_hint: Một vài đứa trẻ thể hiện tính bạo lực ở trường vì xem quá nhiều phim hành động.
data.en_hint: Some children often act violence out at school because they watch too much action movies.
data.content_game_1: Some children often act violence out at school because they watch too much action movies.
data.answer_en_hint: Some children often act violence out at school because they watch too much action movies.

data.trans_hint: Băng đó đánh cho hắn ta bầm dập vì không trả đủ tiền tháng này.
data.en_hint: The gang beat him up for not paying enough money this month.
data.content_game_1: The gang beat him up for not paying enough money this month.
data.answer_en_hint: The gang beat him up for not paying enough money this month.

data.trans_hint: Cậu ấy đã thành công trong việc cải tà quy chính để giờ đây có một cuộc sống tốt hơn.
data.en_hint: He has done well at turning over a new leaf for a better life now.
data.content_game_1: He has done well at turning over a new leaf for a better life now.
data.answer_en_hint: He has done well at turning over a new leaf for a better life now.

data.trans_hint: Cậu ta thường tìm đến băng nhóm để lấp đầy khoảng trống để lại từ quan hệ không tốt với cha mẹ.
data.en_hint: The boy often goes to the gang to fill the gap left by poor relationships with his parents.
data.content_game_1: The boy often goes to the gang to fill the gap left by poor relationships with his parents.
data.answer_en_hint: The boy often goes to the gang to fill the gap left by poor relationships with his parents.

data.trans_hint: Cậu nên quên việc trả đũa chúng nó đi vì cậu chẳng là gì ở địa bàn này cả.
data.en_hint: You should forget about getting them back as you are nothing in this area.
data.content_game_1: You should forget about getting them back as you are nothing in this area.
data.answer_en_hint: You should forget about getting them back as you are nothing in this area.

data.trans_hint: Người anh trai đã khiến cho cậu ta sa ngã khi để cậu thử ma túy.
data.en_hint: His brother led him astray when letting him try out drugs.
data.content_game_1: His brother led him astray when letting him try out drugs.
data.answer_en_hint: His brother led him astray when letting him try out drugs.

data.trans_hint: Tôi tin hăn ta khi hắn nói sẽ trả thù. Hắn vốn nói là làm.
data.en_hint: I trust him when he says he will take a revenge. He means business.
data.content_game_1: I trust him when he says he will take a revenge. He means business.
data.answer_en_hint: I trust him when he says he will take a revenge. He means business.

data.trans: Leo dần lên (vị trí cao hơn)
data.trans_hint: Để leo lên vị trí cao hơn trong bang này, cậu phải chứng minh mình trung thành tuyệt đối.
data.en_hint: To work your way up in this gang, you have to prove to be totally loyal to the gang.
data.content_game_1: to work your way up in this gang, you have to prove to be totally loyal to the gang.
data.answer_en_hint: to work your way up in this gang, you have to prove to be totally loyal to the gang.
